page.name: Datadot 10 years
page.title: 10 years â€¢ datadot design studio
page.description: In 2024, Datadot celebrated its 10th anniversary and to celebrate this we created a visualization of all the projects carried out during this decade.

techsheet.main: We have encoded our projects from the last 10 years into a data visualization to make our history visible through the projects we have already carried out. Based on the idea that infovis can help us see the complexity of the world, we looked for a way to facilitate access without reducing the wealth of information. In this way, we have created structures that are molded, complemented and transformed according to the various possible combinations of information.
techsheet.encourage: We hope you enjoy the journey and explore our history.

desktop.1: To celebrate 10 years of Datadot's life, we built this platform to tell our story in the way we like best: through data visualization. We hope you enjoy it :)
desktop.2: Each unit is a delivery made over the life of the datadot
desktop.3: You can interact with the units
desktop.4: Explore our deliveries in different ways through the left and top panels. The clear filters button returns you to the initial state
desktop.6: Discover our history through other senses
